attributes.action: Urgent call for the government classify methoxetamine as a class A drug
attributes.additional_details:
Methoxetamine is a dangerous and extremely unsafe drug for consumption.

Methoxetamine currently being sold as synthetic substitute for ketamine.

People are being sold it unaware of  the risks that it imposes and this is causing their safety to be truly compromised.

This petition is calling on the government to take responsibility and remove this incredibly strong and dangerous drug from our streets.
